stranger.name: Stranger
stranger.description: The Stranger is an enigmatic figure who appears to have knowledge of the city and its current state. He is unkillable and serves as a guide for the player at the beginning of the game.
dialogue: Welcome, traveler. You seem lost. Allow me to shed some light on your predicament.

refugees.name: Refugee
refugees.description: A refugee fleeing the chaos in the city. They are scared and desperate for safety.
dialogue: Please, help us. The Majis are hunting us down like animals.

refugees.name: Refugee Child
refugees.description: A small child who has lost their family in the chaos. They cling to you, seeking comfort.

inquisitor_geld.name: Inquisitor Geld
inquisitor_geld.description: A high-ranking member of the Sancta Trinitas Inquisition. He appears to be among the refugees, perhaps seeking to escape the chaos.
dialogue: I never thought I'd see the day when the Inquisitor sought refuge with the common folk. Damned Majis...
